entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
